name: A of...
description:
Important! The game must to be played in 16:9 or 16:10

"A of..." tells a personal story about a terrible mental disease.

The game has a simple mechanic, based on the popular 8-puzzle. Players will discover the story interacting with the scenario.

It's a very short game and can be played in less than 10 minutes.

Art:

María Aznar and Begoña Pérez.

Story,  game design, code and sound:

J. Felipe Molina

The game was made in less than 100 hours.
